briefTitle: A Study of an Investigational Zoster Vaccine, in Subjects With a History of Herpes Zoster (V211-014)
officialTitle: A Phase III Clinical Trial to Study the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Zoster Vaccine Live in Subjects With a History of Herpes Zoster
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the investigational zoster vaccine, is generally well tolerated when administered to participants with a history of herpes zoster.

primaryOutcome.measure: Vaccine-related Serious Adverse Experiences (SAEs) for 28 Days Postvaccination
